question:
You have recently started a job in a new company.Write a letter to an English speaking friend.In your letter,
Explain why you changed the job
Describe your new job
Tell him/her your other news
text: I hope you and your family are doing well. I am excited to share the news with you that I have switched my job from a local computer software development company to Google.

The first thing which motivated me to  Change my profession was that google is paying almost double salary as compared to my last company's income. In addition, this firm is providing incentives which will be fruitful for me as well as my family.

I would to tell you about my new job in which I am working as a software developer with experienced team members of Google. Moreover, I am working from home which is beneficial for me because it would save my travelling time.

Oh, another thing I wanted to mention is that I am coming to Canada in December.  I hope you will be free and we will make a plan for The Christmas party because it is a long time since we did not see each other.
I am looking  forward to hearing from you.

error_list.error_des: It seems that there is a pronoun problem here.
